channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: Just a nerdy dude writing a nerdy blog

item.title: dvorak
item.description: So probably about 4 years ago now I started to really get into mechanical keyboards. And I don’t mean that I bought one and that was that. Like, within a year I’m pretty sure I already owned at least 2 keyboards and a handful of keycaps. That led me to look into other keyboard related things like alternate layouts.
